author: pipermerriam
content: Glad to have you all here. Please ask questions if you have them. Happy to clarify things.

author: ja_0001
content: Thanks Piper. Only one Q for now: What is your favorite animal or pet ? Cheers

author: pipermerriam
content: Somewhere between a beaver, a fox, and a red panda.  Beavers are badass because they build things.  Foxes are clever (spirit animal?), Red pandas are cute incarnate.

author: ja_0001
content: Interesting ! Thanks for sharing it ! I will try to picture it in my mind.

author: ja_0001
content: Btw agreed with the spirit animals idea.
